noAccount.title: No accounts matching the selected filter.

onboard.title: Onboard AWS Account
onboard.step1: In a separate browser tab, login to the aws console using the correct account.

attention.title: Attention
attention.description: Ensure that you are logged in to AWS account #{{accountId}} in region {{region}}.

onboard.step2: Click on the "Create Stack" button, this opens a separate browser tab and takes you to the CloudFormation console where you can review the stack information and provision it.

caution.title: Caution!
caution.description: Be advised that deploying a new CFN stack may cause any workspaces associated with this account in SWB to become unusable. To proceed, please acknowledge the warning below.

onboard.acknowledgement: I am aware that re-onboarding this account may render workspaces associated with this account to become unusable.
onboard.step3: After creating the CFN stack, SWB will wait for the stack to finish deploying and then onboard your account. You can click the "Done" button below to be taken back to the Accounts page while you wait.

name.label: Account Name
name.placeholder: Type the name of this account

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: Type description for this AWS account

externalId.label: External ID
externalId.placeholder: Type external ID for this AWS account
